text: Nehͻ nko ara na Dͻnhwere no ho nimdeε no wͻ; aduaba biara a εbefri n’abena mu afire, anaa ͻbaa biara a obeyinsεn anaasε ͻbεwoͻ no, ne (nyinaa) wͻ ne Nimdeε mu.
